name: Chiikawa Die-Cut Soft POCOPOCO (Furuhonya)
description:
You can attach it to the back of a smartphone for storage or use it as a stand.Mascot part is made of soft rubber type.
Size (approx.): H51×W49×D15～32mmWeight (approx.): 18gMaterial: PVC, ABS, TPU, stainless steel, siliconeManufacturing location: China※ When using, if you rotate the Mascot part counterclockwise, the Mascot part will pop out. When you finish using it, rotate Mascot clockwise while pressing it in.※ This product uses a silicone adhesive sheet to attach to the smartphone. Please use it after removing any dirt from the surface where it will be attached. If attached with dirt or oil remaining, the adhesive strength of the adhesive sheet may drop significantly, and it may not be usable.※ If the surface to be attached is made of glass or has an anti-fingerprint treatment, it may peel off easily. In that case, we recommend using a case made of wood resin.※ Depending on the type of smartphone you use, it may not be usable as a stand. Please understand in advance.※ It is compatible with models that have a flat surface wider than the product size.※ If the adhesion of this product is not functional, please attach the included auxiliary sheet to the desired location, and then attach this product on top of it. Please note that the auxiliary seal cannot be repositioned.

name: Chiikawa Apple Watch 40mm Glass Protector Case (Chiikawa)
description:
This is a case compatible with Apple Watch 40mm (SE/Series 6/5 (excluding Ceramic)/4).The glass protector has a character design, and when the screen is lit, the design can be seen faintly.

※ This product is compatible with Apple Watch 40mm (SE/Series 6/5 (excluding Ceramic)/4). It cannot be used with other models.※ Charging is possible while this product is attached.※ Because the glass protector is integrated into the case, there may be cases where the screen becomes difficult to see.※ Please do not leave this product in places exposed to direct sunlight, near heating appliances, in high temperature and high humidity areas, or in places with a lot of dust for a long time. It may cause deformation or deterioration.※ Apple Watch is not included with this product.

name: Chiikawa Multi-Ring Plus Mascot Strap (Chiikawa)
description:
This is a shoulder strap with a soft and large Chiikawa attached three-dimensionally Mascot.
